majorTasks.name: Captain Phillips
majorTasks.task: Steal and equip the Captain's uniform and ID badge, then successfully depart the sub.
majorTasks.tip: I Don't know how to complete this task: Captain Phillips

majorTasks.name: A Sinking Feeling
majorTasks.task:
Disable all the main floor pumps and the airlock, then find a way to scuttle the sub.
Escape.
majorTasks.tip: I Don't know how to complete this task: A Sinking Feeling

majorTasks.name: Darkness, Imprisoning Me
majorTasks.task: Disable at least 50% of the ships batteries. Cause a reactor meltdown and depart the sub... *With* the surplus stock of uranium.
majorTasks.tip: I Don't know how to complete this task: Darkness, etc. etc.

majorTasks.name: Breaking Bad
majorTasks.task:
Cause the Security Officer to experience psychosis by injecting them with Methamphetamines.
Plant some drugs on them and escape via the diving bell.
majorTasks.tip: I Don't know how to complete this task, Breaking Wheh!?

majorTasks.name: The Cask of Amontillado
majorTasks.task:
Handcuff another crew member inside a ballast tank, then successfully weld the hatch closed.
You win if they drown before they are discovered.
majorTasks.tip: I Don't know how to complete this task: Cask of Armadillo

majorTasks.name: Houston We've Had A Problem
majorTasks.task: Cause an explosion that destroys the ship's oxygen generator and then successfully return to the station you left from.
majorTasks.tip: I Don't know how to complete this task: Houston somethings fucky

majorTasks.name: MURMAIDER
majorTasks.task: Murder everyone in the crew in a unique fashion, then join the creatures beneath the sea.

majorTasks.name: World Disarmament Conference
majorTasks.task:
Remove every (lethal) weapon from the sub, then handcuff everyone else.
Stun and grab, then move cuffs to their inventory and click the bar above the item to equip it to them ;)
majorTasks.tip: I Don't know how to complete this task

majorTasks.name: Interspacial Weapons Deals
majorTasks.task: Smuggle a shipment of at least 20 fuel rods from the sub to a station.
majorTasks.tip: I Don't know how to complete this task: Why is fuel a weapon deal?
